name: A Stroll Through The Void
description:
A Stroll Through The Void is a video game by Mt. Berkoo. After the police mysteriously blocked off the way back home, you have to take a detour...only things are not always as they seem. What exactly is happening before your eyes? 

___

Short and weird walking simulator experience (10-15mins) with its own soundtrack made by me, Mt. Berkoo.
